TextView.android:text: INTERVIEWER: Now, please allow me to ask you about the materials of your homestead/dwelling/residence and assets that you own
What is the main source of drinking water for members of your household ? (Circle One Response, Or Write Response For 96)
What kind of main toilet facility do members of your household usually use ? (If ‘Flush’, Or ‘Pour Flush’, Probe: Where Does It Flush To ?) (Circle One Response, Or Write Response For 96)
Do you share this toilet facility with other households?
Including your own household, how many households use this toilet facility? No. Of Households (If Less Than 10)
Where is this toilet facility located ?
What device does this household use most of the time for cooking food, making tea/coffee, or boiling drinking water ? (Circle One Response, Or Write Response For 96)

When cooking, what type of fuel or energy source does this household use most of the time for cooking food, making tea/coffee, or boiling drinking water? (Circle One Response, Or Write Response For 96)
Where is the cooking done most of the time? (Circle One Response, Or Write Response For 96)

What is the main material of the floor of your homestead/dwelling/residence? (Circle One Response, Or Write Response For 96) (“Main Material” Is The Material That Covers The Largest Amount Of Floor Space)

What is the main material of the roof of your homestead/dwelling/residence ? (Circle One Response, Or Write Response For 96) (“Main Material” Is The Material That Covers The Largest Amount Of Roof Space)

What is the main material of the exterior walls of the house that is your main homestead/dwelling/residence? (Circle One Response, Or Write Response For 96) (“Main Material” Is The Material That Covers The Largest Amount Of Exterior Wall Space)
How many rooms in your homestead/dwelling/residence are used for sleeping ? (Write The Number On The Blank) (A Room Divided By A Curtain Counts As One Room)
How many rooms in your homestead/dwelling/residence are used for sleeping?-Don’t know/Refused to respond
Does your household own any homestead?
Does your household own any agricultural land?
The Interviewer Should Ask About Household Ownership For Each Item Listed Below. Tick Item(S) That Apply (“Yes”).
